channel.title: Alan Moore on Aleph-Zero-Heros

item.title: Alan Moore and Watchmen
item.description: Quis custodiet ipsos custodes If you don’t know why I selected a Rorschach inkblot test as the featured art for today, you need to read Alan Moore’s Watchmen. Watchmen redefined comics for me. It took something I liked, and showed me it could be important as well, all the time viciously satirising its own genre. And rebuilding that genre into something better. And it counts in the space I care about: there is a movie, and on-line … It’s not as big as the MCU but in many ways the comic was just as important.
